Shaman.text: Hey ! You're just in time ! I just finished my special recipe... My little babies Globbings are awake !Look at them... aren't they cute ? Who's a good baby ? Who's a good baby ? Yes you aaaare !

Haem. Well. My Globbings are still weak and clumsy. Altought, they are supposed to settle in the forest, beyond the cavern near my swamp. And I'm so busy with.. stuffs. You know. Voodoo, skulls to reduce, chicken waiting to be disemboweled...
Would you be a sweetheart and watch after them ?
